CodeplexIssue.Title: Crash when accessing ressources
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
Our application has embedded ressources in various assemblies used the the netoffice plugin.
The application crashes when accessing these resources. If all ressources are moved to a seperate assembly the problem goes away.
However a fix in the netoffice code can also solve the problem.
Attached is a PDF document with the fix. Will you apply this fix in upcomming release of the Netoffice components.
